thread.title: Oil companies violated state injection permits 822 times in 2014
thread.title_full: Oil companies violated state injection permits 822 times in 2014 - San Francisco Chronicle

author: David R. Baker
title: Oil companies violated state injection permits 822 times in 2014
text:
Photo: Mark Ralston, AFP / Getty Images State regulators tracked violations of wastewater injections by oil companies. State regulators tracked violations of wastewater injections by oil...
California’s beleaguered oil regulating agency on Thursday released a long-overdue report showing the number of permits it issues each year to petroleum companies that want to dispose of their wastewater by injecting it underground — and the number of times those businesses break the rules. State regulators tracked violations of wastewater injections by oil companies. State regulators tracked violations of wastewater injections by oil...
California’s beleaguered oil regulating agency on Thursday released a long-overdue report showing the number of permits it issues each year to petroleum companies that want to dispose of their wastewater by injecting it underground — and the number of times those businesses break the rules.
